'''0.2.6_01''' is a server version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on November 30, 2010.<ref>{{tumblr|notch|2050336602|Bug Update 3|November 30, 2010}}</ref>

== Changes ==
* Players are no longer given 64 [[snowball]]s upon joining a server.
